extendedInfo.description: Animal, Space and Forest Matching Game for Kids and ToddlersStart playing now and match all animals living in the forest, meet astonauts and a lot of other cute animals with the identical object in the middle of the game. This app will help toddlers to develop their visual perception and cognitive skills. The simple drag & drop mechanism also helps to train the fine motor skills of your kid. Within three different themes (Animals, Space and Forest), over 50 different objects can be matched one after another. Each game has a nicely illustrated image with 8 related images around. Just drag the matching objects into the middle and see how much fun it is! reviews.title: Too many ads
reviews.comment: My nephew loves this game but way too many ads pop up
reviews.author: Maria Norrise

reviews.title: Why
reviews.comment: Again why put adds in a toddler game. I clicked on a ad to see what it would take me to and its a very dark game that a 2 year old does not need to see
reviews.author: Jonathan evans

reviews.title: Lil cus loves it lil to much ads
reviews.author: Janiyah Bynum
